ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is verily He who initiates and repeats.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He it is Who creates for the first time and He it is Who will create again,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who creates all things and causes them to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed it is He Who initiates and redoes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, He it is Who begins and repeats.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely He it is Who originates and reproduces,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely it is He who originates, and brings again,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! He it is Who produceth, then reproduceth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it is He who begins and repeats [His creation],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily He! He it is who beginneth and repeateth it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is indeed He who originates and brings back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is He Who creates from the very beginning, and He can restore (life).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, He it is Who begins (punishment) and repeats (punishment in the Hereafter) (or originates the creation of everything, and then repeats it on the Day of Resurrection).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is He who originates and repeats.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is He who begins and repeats.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:13] Assuredly it is He Who originates, creation, and restores, and is never thwarted in what He wills,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! He it is Who produceth) He it is Who begins creation from a sperm drop, (then reproduceth) a new creation after death, 745
